name: Minor improvements
body:
## What's Changed
* Remove mage by @ph4r5h4d in https://github.com/ph4r5h4d/wait4it/pull/65
* Bump go.mongodb.org/mongo-driver from 1.10.3 to 1.11.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ph4r5h4d/wait4it/pull/66
* Go version updated to 1.19

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ph4r5h4d/wait4it/compare/v11.1.4...v11.1.5

name: Fix a bug
body:
A bug related to an environment variable that was not defined has been fixed.
I added a new action to the project to ensure that binary builds for all the platforms are created automatically.

name: Security release
body: This version introduces some security bug fixes.

name: Codebase Improvement and a small feature on HTTP check
body:
Community members have heavily revised the codebase. For more info, you can check the commits in the master branch.
HTTP check now has a new option to control the HTTP follow redirect. For more info, check the README.

name: Add Aerospike support
body: This release adds support for Aerospike.

name: Add support for ElasticSearch
body: This version has some improvement and adds support for ElasticSearch.

name: Fix bugs
body: This release will fix a bug with the TCP checker validator.

name: Add Memcached support
body: This release will add Memcached support and also, introduce a simpler interface for the validate func.

name: Add RabbitMQ support
body:
In this release, we add support for RabbitMQ.
Thanks to @2hamed.

name: Bug fixes and Improvments.
body: This release will address some issues from earlier days of wait4it development.

name: Add support for Redis Cluster
body: This version adds support for Redis Cluster. This version can only check one host within Redis cluster, using multiple hosts to check cluster status for Redis will be added in the next version.

name: Add support for Redis
body:
This release adds support for Redis.
Currently, it only supports Redis single instance, support for Redis Sentinel and cluster will be added in the future. For the moment, wait4it can wait for the single instance of Redis.

name: MongoDB Support
body:
This release will add MongoDB support to wait4it.
Currently, wait4it only supports username/password authentication for MongoDB, if you think another authentication method is needed, kindly open an issue.

name: Add support for environment variables
body: Check the readme file to see what has been added.

name: Add support for HTTP check
body: This release adds support for Http check, among other checks, for more info check the README.

name: Add Support for PostgresSQL
body: Check the README, and you will find necessary information regarding how to use PostgresSQL.

name: Add Support for MySQL
body:
This release introduces numerous refactoring to the codes and also adds support for checking MySQL service status.

Also, note that checking MySQL will check if the service is ready for accepting connections and not just checking if the port is open.

name: First release
body:
This is the first release with basic functionality, it needs improvement and further testing.
Currently, only build for Linux x86_64 is supported on releases, if you need other arch or os just open an issue.
